title: San Benito County MEHKO
description: Home-based restaurant permit in San Benito County for up to 30 meals/day or 60 meals/week, max $50,000 annual sales. Fees billed hourly at $110 for annual permit and plan check. Key limits include same-day prep/serve, no outdoor advertising, and 1 full-time employee max.

steps.title: Plan Your MEHKO
steps.content:
**What to do:** Confirm your home and menu fit San Benito County MEHKO limits.

**Why it matters:** Approval depends on staying within county and state rules.

**What you need:**
- ☐ Residence in San Benito County
- ☐ Menu and daily/weekly production plan (≤30/day, ≤60/week)
- ☐ Basic kitchen setup and safe food practices

**Where/how:** Review county MEHKO info and limits; visit the Environmental Health page.

**Cost & time:** $0 · 10–30 minutes planning

**Ready when:** You can state your meal volume fits county limits.
searchTerms: San Benito County MEHKO meal limits
San Benito County MEHKO rules 2025
San Benito County Environmental Health MEHKO

steps.title: Approvals & Training
steps.content:
**What to do:** Get Certified Food Protection Manager (Food Safety Manager) and Food Handler cards for helpers.

**Why it matters:** Required for safe operation and permitting.

**What you need:**
- ☐ Food Safety Manager certificate (ANSI-CFP recognized)
- ☐ Food Handler cards for helpers (if any)
- ☐ Landlord/HOA OK or city business license if applicable

**Where/how:** Take an ANSI-approved Food Manager course/exam; keep PDFs ready for submission. Visit the county site for program details.

**Cost & time:** ~$60–$90 · 1–2 days total (study + exam)

**Ready when:** You have a Food Safety Manager certificate PDF and any needed approvals.
searchTerms: San Benito Food Manager certification
San Benito County Food Handler card
San Benito County MEHKO training requirements

steps.title: Prepare Required Documents
steps.content:
**What to do:** Gather everything you'll submit.

**Why it matters:** Incomplete packets delay review and inspection.

**What you need:**
- ☐ SOP form — go to Step 3: Standard Operating Procedures (SOP)
- ☐ Health Permit Application — go to Step 4: Health Permit Application
- ☐ Food Safety Manager certificate (from Step 2: Approvals & Training)
- ☐ Government ID and basic business info

**Where/how:** Keep files as PDFs/photos for upload or printing; use county forms.

**Cost & time:** $0 · 30–60 minutes

**Ready when:** All docs are completed, signed, and saved as PDFs.
searchTerms: San Benito County MEHKO forms
San Benito MEHKO SOP requirements
San Benito Environmental Health applications

steps.title: Standard Operating Procedures (SOP)
steps.content:
**What to do:** Complete the San Benito County MHKO SOP form (menu, prep, storage, sanitation, delivery).

**Why it matters:** Shows the county how you'll keep food safe at home.

**What you need:**
- ☐ Menu and ingredients list
- ☐ Cooking/cooling/holding methods and equipment
- ☐ Cleaning & sanitizing plan; handwashing setup

**Where/how:** Fill the SOP in this step; attach requested items (menu, water/septic info if applicable).

**Cost & time:** $0 · 30–60 minutes

**Ready when:** SOP is complete, initialed where required, and matches your operation.
searchTerms: San Benito County MHKO SOP PDF
San Benito MEHKO application form
San Benito home kitchen SOP template

steps.title: Health Permit Application
steps.content:
**What to do:** Fill the San Benito County Food Facility Permit Application for your MHKO.

**Why it matters:** This is your official request for a one-year MEHKO health permit.

**What you need:**
- ☐ Owner/contact info and home kitchen address
- ☐ Food Safety Manager certificate details
- ☐ SOP — go to Step 3: Standard Operating Procedures (SOP)

**Where/how:** Complete the application in this step; have it ready for submission with your SOP.

**Cost & time:** $0 to fill · 15–30 minutes

**Ready when:** Application is complete and consistent with your SOP.
searchTerms: San Benito Food Facility Permit Application
San Benito County health permit MEHKO
San Benito MEHKO permit form

steps.title: Submit Application & Pay Fees
steps.content:
**What to do:** Submit your packet and pay fees.

**Why it matters:** Review begins after complete submission and payment.

**What you need:**
- ☐ Completed Health Permit Application — go to Step 4: Health Permit Application
- ☐ Completed SOP — go to Step 3: Standard Operating Procedures (SOP)
- ☐ Food Safety Manager certificate
- ☐ Payment method

**Where/how:** Submit to Environmental Health, 351 Tres Pinos Rd, Ste C-1, Hollister, CA 95023. You can inquire via EnvironmentalHealth@sanbenitocountyca.gov or (831) 636-4035. Credit cards accepted (2.25% fee) and e-check ($1.25).

**Cost & time:** Annual permit & plan check billed at $110/hour · 10–20 minutes to submit

**Ready when:** County confirms receipt and takes payment.
searchTerms: San Benito MEHKO fee $110 per hour
San Benito Environmental Health payment options
San Benito MEHKO submit application

steps.title: Schedule & Pass Inspection
steps.content:
**What to do:** Coordinate a home kitchen inspection once your application is under review.

**Why it matters:** Passing inspection is required before operating.

**What you need:**
- ☐ Kitchen set up per SOP (thermometer, sanitizer, handwash station)
- ☐ Equipment working and clean
- ☐ Records/logs ready if requested

**Where/how:** Environmental Health will provide scheduling details after you apply.

**Cost & time:** Included in hourly fees · 1–2 hours on site

**Ready when:** You pass or complete any corrections.
searchTerms: San Benito MEHKO inspection checklist
San Benito Environmental Health home kitchen inspection
MEHKO inspection preparation San Benito

steps.title: Receive Your Permit
steps.content:
**What to do:** Obtain and keep your MEHKO permit on site.

**Why it matters:** A valid permit (one calendar year) is required to operate.

**What you need:**
- ☐ Final approval notice
- ☐ Printed or digital permit

**Where/how:** Issued by Environmental Health after approval.

**Cost & time:** No extra cost beyond fees paid · a few days after approval

**Ready when:** Permit is in hand and displayed during operation.
searchTerms: San Benito MEHKO permit validity one year
San Benito County MEHKO permit issued
San Benito Environmental Health permit status

steps.title: Operate & Stay Compliant
steps.content:
**What to do:** Follow your SOP and county rules.

**Why it matters:** Staying within limits protects customers and your permit.

**What you need:**
- ☐ Track meals (≤30/day, ≤60/week) and sales (≤$50,000/year)
- ☐ Temperature & cleaning records
- ☐ Update SOP and notify county if your procedures/menu change

**Where/how:** Keep records simple; contact Environmental Health with changes.

**Cost & time:** Renewal billed hourly ($110/hr) · ongoing

**Ready when:** You're operating within limits and set a reminder to renew annually.
searchTerms: San Benito MEHKO weekly meal limit 60
San Benito MEHKO sales limit $50,000
San Benito County MEHKO compliance rules

steps.title: Contact Info
steps.content:
**What to do:** Reach out to Environmental Health with questions.

**Why it matters:** Staff can answer San Benito-specific requirements and fees.

**What you need:**
- ☐ Phone and email
- ☐ Office address and hours
- ☐ Website for forms/resources

**Where/how:** San Benito County Environmental Health, 351 Tres Pinos Rd, Suite C-1, Hollister, CA 95023. Hours: Mon–Fri 8am–5pm. Phone: (831) 636-4035. Email: EnvironmentalHealth@sanbenitocountyca.gov. Visit the Environmental Health page.

**Cost & time:** $0 · depends on your question

**Ready when:** You have the info needed to proceed.
searchTerms: San Benito Environmental Health contact
San Benito MEHKO phone number
San Benito County MEHKO office hours
